title: Hi, I'm Robert.
text:
Hi, I'm Robert.
            I am a Data Scientist with a passion for Immunology.
                I am currently a PhD candidate at Case Western Reserve University in Pathology.
            Please explore my CV or my Projects (scientific and personal), or just drop me a line.

title: Projects
text:
Sorting Students into Random Groups
Code on GitHub
A simple project to make a CLI and GUI to sort students into groups using Rust. The purpose was:

I wanted for someone to be able to run this without having R or Python installed,
I wanted to learn a little bit of a compiled language, and
My fiance√© had a use for such a utility.
